title: Using Data to Make the Case for a Just System | Ep 54
description:
This week I talk to Leonine Institute contributor Tony Fernandez (@phattonez on twitter) about his use of data and graphs to make the case for a more just, Catholic economic system.

Click here for Tony's graph
